name: @luisfun/x-canvas
description: This module supports the coding of canvas drawing
author: Luis (https://github.com/luisfun)

scripts.build: npm run build:index && npm run build:worker && npm run build:min && attw -P . --ignore-rules cjs-resolves-to-esm
scripts.patch: npm run fix && npm run build && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor: npm run fix && npm run build && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
